name: SKY RIDER (itch)
description:
In "Black Eagle" The Game You will be flying in Starships' to new and Amazing Worlds' looking for hidden Treasure and fighting Mythical Creatures'.  In this Demo game You will learn how to Fly a Golden Star-Ship through a Space-Sea and a Star-Rider Obstacle course. "Black Eagle" is in Development Mode. Please feel free to leave any suggestions' or comments'.

Unseenseven Games
